subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text: {{ja-kanji|grade=3|rs=竹06}}

subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|とう|yomi=o}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=とう}} {{m|zh|等|tr=tong<sup>X</sup>||step, grade}}, extended to mean ''... kind of thing''.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=goon|とう|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

subSections.title: Adverb
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|adverb|とう}}

# [[et cetera]]

subSections.title: Suffix
Usage notes
subSections.text: For the ''et cetera'' sense, the ''tō'' reading is somewhat more formal than the ''nado'' reading.

subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|など}}
From earlier {{m|ja|なんど|tr=nando||etc., and so forth, and such like}}, from earlier {{m|ja|何と|tr=nani to|lit=and what||etc., and so forth, and such like}}, itself a compound of {{m|ja|何|tr=nani||what}} + {{m|ja|と|tr=to||and}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref><ref name="DJS">{{R:Daijisen}}</ref>

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|など}}

subSections.title: Adverb
Usage notes
subSections.text:
For the ''et cetera'' sense, the ''tō'' reading is somewhat more formal than the ''nado'' reading.

Often spelled in hiragana, as {{m|ja|など}}.

subSections.title: Etymology 3
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|なんど}}
From earlier {{m|ja|何と|tr=nani to|lit=and what||etc., and so forth, and such like}}, itself a compound of {{m|ja|何|tr=nani||what}} + {{m|ja|と|tr=to||and}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref><ref name="DJS">{{R:Daijisen}}</ref>

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|なんど}}

subSections.title: Adverb
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|adverb|なんど}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=なんど|archaic|mostly|_|obsolete}} [[et cetera]], that [[kind]] of thing, and so on

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text:
Largely [[supersede]]d by the ''nado'' reading above.

May be spelled in hiragana, as {{m|ja|なんど}}.

subSections.title: Etymology 4
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|ら}}
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=ら}}.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|ら}}

subSections.title: Suffix
Usage notes
subSections.text: Often spelled in hiragana, as {{m|ja|ら}}.

subSections.title: References
subSections.text: <references/>
